actionCalls.name: Copy_1_of_Send_Email_to_the_candidate
actionCalls.label: Copy 1 of Send Email to the candidate

value.stringValue: Certificate Rejected, Notify Candidate Email Template - TBC Worker App
Certificate Rejected, Notify Candidate Email Template

fields.name: Competency_Not_Found2
fields.fieldText: Competency Record has not been found with the given Certificate Name. Ticket will not be created

fields.name: Error_Message_validity
fields.fieldText: Please populate the Valid Start Date and End Date in the 'Validity' section and refresh your browser before you can verify the Certificate.

fields.name: error
fields.fieldText: There is no attachment in this certificate. Please attach a document before approving/rejecting this certificate.

fields.name: Returned_Rejected2
fields.fieldText:
Last Update regarding the current

Information


Rejected by:{!Get_Certification_Record.Rejected_By__r.FirstName} {!Get_Certification_Record.Rejected_By__r.LastName}

﻿On:

{!Get_Certification_Record.Rejected_Date__c}

With the following Reason: {!Get_Certification_Record.Rejection_Reason__c}

fields.name: Approved
fields.fieldText:
Last Update regarding the current

Information


Verified by:{!Get_Certification_Record.Verified_By__r.FirstName} {!Get_Certification_Record.Verified_By__r.LastName}

﻿On: {!Get_Certification_Record.Verified_Date__c}

fields.name: certificateApproval
fields.fieldText:
Certificate Approval

Please use the buttons below to either Approve or Reject the document that the candidate has provided.

textTemplates.name: EmailTemplate
textTemplates.text:
Dear {!Get_Certification_Record.b3o__Contact__r.FirstName} {!Get_Certification_Record.b3o__Contact__r.LastName},


We’re reaching out to inform you that your certificate {!Get_Certification_Record.Certificate_Types__c}, which is required for your ongoing work with The Best Connection, has been rejected because of this reason: {!Get_Certification_Record.Rejection_Reason__c}.


To remain compliant and continue with your role, please upload an updated and valid certificate to the MyTBC portal as soon as possible. You can be found here.

Access My Portal


For any further questions or assistance, please don’t hesitate to contact your local branch. Branch details can be found here: www.thebestconnection.co.uk/branches  


Kind Regards
